# Getting Started

New to Watchgate? This section will help you get up and running quickly.

## Files in this section

- **[Installation](1-installation.md)** - Install Watchgate on your system
- **[Quick Setup](2-quick-setup.md)** - Configure your first security policy  
- **[First Plugin](3-first-plugin.md)** - Create and configure your first security plugin

## Recommended Reading Order

1. Start with [Installation](1-installation.md) to get Watchgate installed
2. Follow the [Quick Setup](2-quick-setup.md) guide to configure basic security
3. Learn to create plugins with [First Plugin](3-first-plugin.md)

## Next Steps

Once you've completed the getting started guides, explore:

- **[Core Concepts](../core-concepts/)** - Understand Watchgate's architecture
- **[Tutorials](../tutorials/)** - Practical security implementation guides
- **[Reference](../reference/)** - Technical documentation and troubleshooting
